name: Mr. Archer - King Stickman
description:
Simple to play, use the bow or other weapons to destroy all enemies. Touch and drag to control direction and destroy all. After you become the king of stickman

[Features]

* > 300 Levels
* Endless time
* Sound & effect
* All free
* Play without internet
* No WIFI ? No problem!
Tips:
- The more rows are eliminated, the higher the score is.
I believe you will love it and now download!
